2 #include <ros/ros.h>
3 #include <interactive_robot_hand/Eyes.h>
4 #include <interactive_robot_hand/See.h>
5 #include <interactive_robot_hand/Node.h>
6 #include <stdexcept>
7 #include <math.h>

9 using namespace robot_hand;
10 
11 Eyes::Eyes() : Node() {
12  phidget.init(-1);
13  phidget.waitForAttachment(1000);
14  if (phidget.getLastError()) {
15  ROS_ERROR("Phidget error: %d", phidget.getLastError());
16  }
17  sensor_id = 0;
18  publisher = nh.advertise<interactive_robot_hand::See>("see", 1);
19 }
20 
21 Eyes::~Eyes() {
22 
23 }
24 
25 void Eyes::spin() {
26  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
27  while(ros::ok()) {
28 
29  // Create distance in mm
30  interactive_robot_hand::See see;
31  see.distance = 26873.548 * pow(phidget.getSensorValue(sensor_id), -0.99925);
32 
33  // Publish distance
34  publisher.publish(see);
35  ros::spinOnce();
36  ROS_INFO("Published distance [%f]", see.distance);
37 
38  loop_rate.sleep();
39  }
40 }
41 
42 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
43  ros::init(argc, argv, "eyes");
44 
45  // Create eyes
46  Eyes* eyes = new Eyes();
47 
48  // Run
49  eyes->spin();
50 
51  // Delete eyes
52  delete eyes;
53 
54  return 0;
55 }
